thig16.1:6.3: Kimaṅgaṃ pana → kimaṅga pana (bj, sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); kiṃ pana (?)
thig16.1:18.3: anīkaratto → aṇīkadatto (bj); anikaratto (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thig16.1:24.3: Chuddho → chaḍḍito (sya1ed, sya2ed); chuṭṭho (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
thig16.1:25.1: Chuddhūna → chaḍḍūna (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); chuṭṭhuna (mr)
thig16.1:32.2: pīḷiyamānassa → kilissamānassa (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
thig16.1:36.3: pidahitvā → pidhetvā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); padhatvā (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); pidhitvā (mr)
thig16.1:37.1: ca → pāsādeva (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thig16.1:40.4: Mātāpitaro te dukkhitā → mātāpitaro ca te dukhitā (?)
